Idiv Times - Issue #1

Published - 11/16/2017

The first of many papers produced by the Idiv Times. Some topics include: Fantasy Basketball, Controversy around Wifi, Chalkboard Skills, The Lunch Lines, School Trips, and an overall synopsis of the 2017-2018 school year
